lexUnit.name: shorts.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: short trousers that reach only to the knees or thighs.

sentence.text: Cool , co-ordinating shorts in spicy shades , have an elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams. 100% cotton , machine washable .
